text: @JDiamond1 Only a couple of people may die. They sign waivers knowing the risk, in the midst of Tulsas spiking CoVid19 numbers. Does Trump care that 120000 people have died?  Is his ego that fragile ? Even Tulsa cancelled its Black lives matter events on Juneteenth because of dangers there

entity.name: Juneteenth
entity.description: Juneteenth, the holiday commemorating the day that all enslaved people in the US learned they were free, is being celebrated this year with marches, music and more.
